description:
Today, Pascal-sensei takes the class out to see how a factory operates.
Maybe the choice of the ramen factory was not a coincidence, as Pascal-sensei somehow ends up in the production line...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaishaka Kengaku Hajimemashita / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
We`re Doing Social Studies Field Trips / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
社会科見学はじめました / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
